variables.input:
fetch logs
| filter outsystems.log.type == "Error"
| sort exception.message asc
| summarize collectDistinct(exception.message)

fetch logs
| filterOut outsystems.app.name == ""
| sort outsystems.app.name asc
| summarize collectDistinct(outsystems.app.name)

fetch logs //, scanLimitGBytes: 500, samplingRatio: 1000
| fieldsAdd strTenant=toString(deployment.environment)
| sort strTenant asc
| summarize collectDistinct(deployment.environment)

0.query:
fetch logs //, scanLimitGBytes: 500, samplingRatio: 1000
| filter contains(outsystems.log.type, "Error")
| filter in(exception.message, $Error_Message)
| filter in(outsystems.app.name, $Application)
| filter in(deployment.environment, $Environment)
| fields Timestamp=timestamp, 
  Application=outsystems.app.name, 
  RequestKey=request_key, 
  Message=content, 
  Stacktrace=stack_trace, 
  Host=server_name, 
  Environment=deployment.environment, 
  Tag=tags, 
  SessionId=session_id
| sort Timestamp desc

1.content:
### Error raw data
> Original Outsystems platform logs. Tabel can be filtered by clicking on items
